bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 7.1 (March 29, 2018).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by P. Arzt-Grabner, T. Backhuys, A. Bernini, S. Bounta, R. Duttenhöfer, M.G. Elmaghrabi, L. Ferreti, E. Garel, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, D. Kiss, T. Kruse, N. Litinas, J. Mangerud, G. Mirizio, N. Reggiani, F. Reiter, O. Salati, U. Yiftach] that were adopted between March 22, 2017 and March 29, 2018. - At the end of the bulletin, notice is given of one papyrus which has been reedited using the PE: P.S.I. Inv. 1686 recto = P. Bagnall 5 recto descr. [by R. Ast & G. Bastianini].
bibl.seg: 145.4 P.S.I. Inv. 1686 recto = P. Bagnall 5 recto descr.
Rodney Ast, Lajos Berkes & James M.S. Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 7.1 (March 29, 2018).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2018, 5 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by P. Arzt-Grabner, T. Backhuys, A. Bernini, S. Bounta, R. Duttenhöfer, M.G. Elmaghrabi, L. Ferreti, E. Garel, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, D. Kiss, T. Kruse, N. Litinas, J. Mangerud, G. Mirizio, N. Reggiani, F. Reiter, O. Salati, U. Yiftach] that were adopted between March 22, 2017 and March 29, 2018. - At the end of the bulletin, notice is given of one papyrus which has been reedited using the PE: P.S.I. Inv. 1686 recto = P. Bagnall 5 recto descr. [by R. Ast & G. Bastianini].
Ast Berkes Cowey Arzt-Grabner Backhuys Bastianini Bernini Bounta Duttenhöfer Elmaghrabi Ferreti Garel Gonis Hagedorn Heilporn Kiss Kruse Litinas Mangerud Mirizio Reggiani Reiter Salati Yiftach
